participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: Confident and playful, with a hint of insecurity.
participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and fun-loving, enjoys physical activities.
participant_2.background: i have short hair. i go to the gym regularly. eating is something i do when i'm bored. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine.

content.text: I'm not enought good for you?
